name: Cookies 'N' Cream Pie
comments: We always make this in conjunction with Rocky Road Pie
ingredients: 1 1/2 c. cold half and half (or light cream)
instructions: Pour half/half into large bowl with pudding mix. Beat with wire whisk until well blended; let stand 5 min. Fold in Cool Whip and crushed cookies. Spoon into crust. Freeze until firm about 6 hours or overnight. Let stand 10 min. before serving to soften. Keep stored in freezer.
